abstract: Two new profiles of the Goldman Sachs executives Lloyd C. Blankfein and Gary D. Cohn shed light on the men atop the secretive investment bank.
snippet: Two new profiles of the Goldman Sachs executives Lloyd C. Blankfein and Gary D. Cohn shed light on the men atop the secretive investment bank.
lead_paragraph: Two new profiles of top Goldman Sachs executives — a New York magazine profile of the chief executive, Lloyd C. Blankfein, and a Bloomberg profile of the president, Gary D. Cohn — shed new light on the men atop the secretive investment bank.

headline.main: The Goldman View: Blankfein and Cohn
